data.description:
ğŸ¥ŠJoin Discord at: https://discord.gg/HX2DGCx6ra to win FREE KEYS
ğŸ¥ŠFull Version: https://www.meta.com/experiences/5570284493072465

Unleash Your Inner Boxer, Controller Free! 

A mixed reality (MR) app which seamlessly blends virtual and real world, designed to provide you with an engaging and dynamic workout experience that enhances your physical fitness while having fun. 

ã€Game Featuresã€‘ 
 - Professional Courses & Data Analysis: All workouts are scientifically designed for optimal results, and professional fitness data analysis will help you keep fit!
 - Rhythmic Music Design: Rhythmic and diverse BGM pairs perfectly with boxing actions. You can feel the nitrogen pump from the music while exercising!
 - Accurate Hand-tracking: Fast & intuitive hand tracking, accurate gesture recognition, and unique object interaction design deliver smooth gaming experience, without traditional hand controllers.
 - Multiple scenes & Visual Immersion: Three distinctive scenes, space, atmosphere, and universe, are available to offer excellent visual immersion and smooth performance through professional techniques. The stunning scenes, matched with outstanding music, deliver an unparalleled sensory experience.
 - Combined With MR Technology: MR support makes the combination of virtual and real world possible and provides a realistic exercise environment for users who can also sense their surroundings!
